p: The concentration that inhibited and killed the 50% and 90% of the tested strains (MIC 50 and MIC 90, MBC 50, and MBC 90, respectively) was determined for the selected EOs. Microcidal power was calculated by MBC/MIC ratio of the previous parameters and interpreted based on the criteria of Schwarz etÂ al. ( 2010) and Radhakrishnan, Gnanamani, and Mandal ( 2011).
